code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Button}from'./Button';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./NavBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavBar(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[button,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};useEffect(()=>{showButton();},[]);window.addEventListener('resize',showButton);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"CAPITOLTRADES"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:click?'fas fa-times':'fas fa-bars'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:click?'nav-menu active':'nav-menu',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/search",className:"nav-links-mobile",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Search"})})]}),button&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{path:"/search",buttonStyle:"btn--outline",children:"SEARCH"})]})})});}export default NavBar;
